description.value: When you allow an apparition control over your body, it might vent its fury against your foes. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Relinquish Control], you add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grapple], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Reposition], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip] to the list of actions you can take. You gain a +2 status bonus to the Athletics check to attempt these actions.
